page.title: 02GIRLS' MAGAZINES
page.content: Girls magazines are usually printed on glossy paper.There are pop posters featuring favourite pop music groups such as Duran Duran,Wham and Tears For Fears.There is also a pop page telling you what is going on in the pop world. They have a couple of pages of clothes with the prices and where they got them from.There are beauty features showing you how to apply make-up and how to get a really stunning look. Sometimes they pick one or more readers and take them to get a complete new hairstyle and make-up look.They have colour and black and white photo stories.At the front of the magazine there is a page where people write in and say somethings which happened to them.At the back is a problem page where people write in with their problems.There is also a crossword and free offers.
